TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ProtectedData extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供加密和解密資料的方法。

span.span: Provides methods for encrypting and decrypting data.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別提供存取至資料保護 API (DPAPI) 適用於 Microsoft Windows 2000 和更新版本的作業系統。This class provides access to the Data Protection API (DPAPI) available in Microsoft Windows 2000 and later operating systems. 這是一項服務，由作業系統提供，而且不需要額外的程式庫。This is a service that is provided by the operating system and does not require additional libraries. 它會提供使用的使用者或電腦認證來加密或解密資料的保護。It provides protection using the user or machine credentials to encrypt or decrypt data. 類別包含兩個的包裝函式未受管理的 DPAPI，如和。The class consists of two wrappers for the unmanaged DPAPI, and . 這兩種方法可用來加密和解密資料，例如密碼、 金鑰和連接字串。These two methods can be used to encrypt and decrypt data such as passwords, keys, and connection strings. 如果您在模擬期間使用這些方法，您可能會收到下列錯誤: 「 不是有效的金鑰，以用於指定狀態 」。If you use these methods during impersonation, you may receive the following error: "Key not valid for use in specified state." 會發生這種情況是因為 DPAPI 會儲存使用者設定檔中的索引鍵的資料。This occurs because the DPAPI stores the key data in user profiles. 如果未載入設定檔，則 DPAPI，將無法執行解密。If the profile is not loaded, DPAPI won’t be able to perform the decryption. 若要避免這個錯誤，載入您想要呼叫哪一種方法之前先模擬使用者的設定檔。To prevent this error, load the profile of the user you want to impersonate before calling either method. 使用 DPAPI 與模擬可以帶來相當的複雜性，而且需要謹慎設計選擇。Using DPAPI with impersonation can incur significant complication and requires careful design choices. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用資料保護。The following example shows how to use data protection. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.DataProtectionSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.DataProtectionSample/CPP/dataprotectionsample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.DataProtectionSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.DataProtectionSample/CS/dataprotectionsample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.DataProtectionSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.DataProtectionSample/vb/dataprotectionsample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static byte[] Protect (byte[] userData, byte[] optionalEntropy, System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtectionScope scope);
.method public static hidebysig unsigned int8[] Protect(unsigned int8[] userData, unsigned int8[] optionalEntropy, valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtectionScope scope) cil managed
Public Shared Function Protect (userData As Byte(), optionalEntropy As Byte(), scope As DataProtectionScope) As Byte()
public: static cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Protect(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ userData, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ optionalEntropy, System::Security::Cryptography::DataProtectionScope scope);
static member Protect : byte[] * byte[] * System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtectionScope -> byte[]

param.name: userData
param.span: 包含要加密之資料的位元組陣列。

span.span: A byte array that contains data to encrypt.

param.name: optionalEntropy
param.span: 用來提高加密複雜性的選擇性額外位元組陣列，若為 則表示沒有額外的複雜性。

span.span: An optional additional byte array used to increase the complexity of the encryption, or for no additional complexity.

param.name: scope
param.span: 其中一個列舉值，指定加密的範圍。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the scope of encryption.

summary.span: 加密指定之位元組陣列中的資料，並傳回包含已加密資料的位元組陣列。

span.span: Encrypts the data in a specified byte array and returns a byte array that contains the encrypted data.

returns.span: 表示已加密資料的位元組陣列。

span.span: A byte array representing the encrypted data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可用來加密資料，例如密碼、 金鑰或連接字串。This method can be used to encrypt data such as passwords, keys, or connection strings. `optionalEntropy`參數可讓您新增資料來提高加密複雜性; 指定`null`的任何額外的複雜性。The `optionalEntropy` parameter enables you to add data to increase the complexity of the encryption; specify `null` for no additional complexity. 如果提供，這項資訊也必須使用時解密資料使用方法。If provided, this information must also be used when decrypting the data using the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用這個方法，在模擬期間，您可能會收到下列錯誤: 「 不是有效的金鑰，以用於指定狀態 」。If you use this method during impersonation, you may receive the following error: "Key not valid for use in specified state." 若要避免這個錯誤，載入您想要模擬呼叫方法之前使用者的設定檔。To prevent this error, load the profile of the user you want to impersonate before calling the method. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用資料保護。The following example shows how to use data protection. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.DataProtectionSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.DataProtectionSample/CPP/dataprotectionsample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.DataProtectionSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.DataProtectionSample/CS/dataprotectionsample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.DataProtectionSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.DataProtectionSample/vb/dataprotectionsample.vb#1)]

span.span: The parameter is .
The encryption failed.

exception.span: 本作業系統不支援這個方法。

span.span: The operating system does not support this method.

exception.span: 加密資料時，系統記憶體不足。

span.span: The system ran out of memory while encrypting the data.

permission.span: 使用關聯來保護資料的權限的旗標。

span.span: with the associated flag for permission to protect data.

MemberSignature.Value: public static byte[] Unprotect (byte[] encryptedData, byte[] optionalEntropy, System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtectionScope scope);
.method public static hidebysig unsigned int8[] Unprotect(unsigned int8[] encryptedData, unsigned int8[] optionalEntropy, valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtectionScope scope) cil managed
Public Shared Function Unprotect (encryptedData As Byte(), optionalEntropy As Byte(), scope As DataProtectionScope) As Byte()

public: static cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Unprotect(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ encryptedData, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ optionalEntropy, System::Security::Cryptography::DataProtectionScope scope);
static member Unprotect : byte[] * byte[] * System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtectionScope -> byte[]

param.name: encryptedData
param.span: 含有使用 方法所加密的資料之位元組陣列。

span.span: A byte array containing data encrypted using the method.

param.name: optionalEntropy
param.span: 進行資料加密所使用的選擇性額外位元組陣列，如果沒有使用額外位元組陣列則為 。

span.span: An optional additional byte array that was used to encrypt the data, or if the additional byte array was not used.

param.name: scope
param.span: 其中一個列舉值，指定用來加密資料的資料保護範圍。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the scope of data protection that was used to encrypt the data.

summary.span: 解密指定之位元組陣列中的資料，並傳回包含已解密資料的位元組陣列。

span.span: Decrypts the data in a specified byte array and returns a byte array that contains the decrypted data.

returns.span: 表示已解密資料的位元組陣列。

span.span: A byte array representing the decrypted data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可用來取消保護使用加密的資料方法。This method can be used to unprotect data that was encrypted using the method. 如果`optionalEntropy`參數已在加密期間，它必須提供解密資料。If the `optionalEntropy` parameter was used during encryption, it must be supplied to unencrypt the data. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用這個方法，在模擬期間，您可能會收到下列錯誤: 「 不是有效的金鑰，以用於指定狀態 」。If you use this method during impersonation, you may receive the following error: "Key not valid for use in specified state." 若要避免這個錯誤，載入您想要模擬呼叫方法之前使用者的設定檔。To prevent this error, load the profile of the user you want to impersonate before calling the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用資料保護。The following code example shows how to use data protection. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.DataProtectionSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.DataProtectionSample/CPP/dataprotectionsample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.DataProtectionSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.DataProtectionSample/CS/dataprotectionsample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.DataProtectionSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.DataProtectionSample/vb/dataprotectionsample.vb#1)]

span.span: The parameter is .
The decryption failed.

exception.span: 本作業系統不支援這個方法。

span.span: The operating system does not support this method.
Out of memory.

permission.span: 使用關聯取消保護資料的權限的旗標。

span.span: with the associated flag for permission to unprotect data.
